headers.value: default-src 'self'; base-uri 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src https://dexscreener.com; script-src 'self' https://plausible.io/js/script.js; connect-src 'self' https://plausible.io; frame-ancestors 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests
